title: QUAKE 1 - ultra pack
description:
QUAKE 1 ... again

I&#039;ve put together an updated version of good ol&#039; QUAKE 1

Included in this package is:
- The original quake 1 game (not the executable tho&#039;)
- 2 official expansions + ZerstÃƒÂ¶rer mod
- Darkplaces quake engine (20071120) + dpmod
- Original soundtrack by NiN (.ogg files)
- Bumpmapped monsterskins
- updated textures for everyting else
- rygel-dp-texturepack-high.pk3 (ultra detailed textures)

Remarks:
If you experience poor framerate, you can delete or move rygel-dp-texturepack-high.pk3
You can also change the quality-presets to a lower level (set to MAX default), or decrease resolutions.
Not all of the maps have .lit files. If everything is black, set the lighting setting a notch down. All the original Q1 maps have lightingmaps.

I hope you&#039;ll enjoy this. This is my first attempt at creating something original to upload - besides ripping a CD.

-yog
